abstract: HSBC has suffered an early setback in its attempt to secure a 2.5 billion pound ($5 billion) takeover of Korea’s sixth-largest banking group, Korea Exchange Bank.
lead_paragraph: HSBC has suffered an early setback in its attempt to secure a 2.5 billion pound ($5 billion) takeover of Korea’s sixth-largest banking group, Korea Exchange Bank.

headline.main: Blow to HSBC Bid for Korea Exchange
